data.Sentence: --- Lesson 49  The end of a dream

data.Sentence_cn: 德黑兰的一个年轻人由于对睡地板感到厌倦，于是积蓄多年买了一张真正的床。
data.Sentence: Tired of sleeping on the floor, a young man in Teheran saved up for years to buy a real bed.

data.Sentence_cn: 他平生第一次自豪地拥有了一张既有弹簧又带床垫的床。
data.Sentence: For the first time in his life, he became the proud owner of a bed which had springs and a mattress.

data.Sentence_cn: 由于天气很热，他便把床搬到了他的屋顶上。
data.Sentence: Because the weather was very hot, he carried the bed on to the roof of his house.

data.Sentence_cn: 头两天晚上，他睡得非常好。但第三天晚上起了风暴。
data.Sentence: He slept very well for the first two nights, but on the third night, a storm blew up.

data.Sentence_cn: 一阵大风把床从屋顶上刮了下来，把它摔碎在下面的院子里。
data.Sentence: A gust of wind swept the bed off the roof and sent it crashing into the courtyard below.

data.Sentence_cn: 那年轻人直到床撞到地上才醒了过来。
data.Sentence: The young man did not wake up until the bed had struck the ground.

data.Sentence_cn: 尽管床摔成了碎片，但年轻人却奇迹地没有受伤。
data.Sentence: Although the bed was smashed to pieces, the man was miraculously unhurt.

data.Sentence_cn: 他醒来时，仍然躺在床垫上。
data.Sentence: When he woke up, he was still on the mattress.

data.Sentence_cn: 年轻人看了一眼周围的碎木片和碎金属片，
data.Sentence: Glancing at the bits of wood and metal that lay around him,

data.Sentence_cn: 伤心地捡起了床垫，把它拿进了屋。
data.Sentence: the man sadly picked up the mattress and carried it into his house.

data.Sentence_cn: 他把床垫往地板上一放，很快又睡着了。
data.Sentence: After he had put it on the floor, he promptly went to sleep again.
